headline: The Sacred Rocks
description: A poetic invocation to remember ancient truths, to heed the call of spirit amid distraction, and to honor what endures beneath modern forgetfulness.

fieldDefinitions.whyItMatters: This piece emphasizes the importance of honoring enduring spiritual truths amid modern distractions and technological forgetting.

motifMap.meaning: memory, spiritual inheritance, and foundational truth
cyclical time, ancient knowledge, and continuity of spirit
intuition, the unconscious, and divine timing
modern digital distraction and the risk of forgetting

fieldDefinitions.articleExcerpt: I see the slippage. / I can trace where the sacred rocks used to lay... / Don’t forget the sacred rock / For the blue screen glow.

associatedMedia.description: An illustration of a large standing stone with spiral carvings under a pale moon, titled 'The Sacred Rocks'—symbolizing memory, ritual, and continuity amidst forgetfulness.
